function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective building systems and air distribution patterns","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on industry suggestions over scholarly research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential development changes in construction and built environment sectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expected economic impacts leading to new paradigms in engineering and design of built environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Faster push towards digitization and digitalization in more developed cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to population density and compact design in built environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to sudden policy changes impacting built environment development","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Gradual development of new practices and perspectives leading to changes in built environment design and construction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"In-person teaching conferences, morbidity and mortality conferences, and simulation labs are being avoided due to the covid-19 pandemic, leading to a decrease in resident case volume","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rotations between different sites within the same institution should be limited or canceled to reduce the risk to residents, patients, and healthcare personnel","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The american college of surgeons and government institutions recommending against the continuation of elective surgery, with most facilities minimizing participants in any operation to essential personnel only","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of a closed facebook group for educational purposes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing flipped classroom technique for conferences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Institution of separate tracks for junior and senior residents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of teleconference software may lead to increased screen time and sedentary behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cyber security measures and privacy concerns related to the use and storage of sensitive information on cloud accounts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases through in-person meetings if precautions are not strictly followed","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants attending remotely due to self-quarantining and mandated staffing changes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Some faculty struggling with novel technology and poor bandwidth connections for participants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased dependence on telehealth clinics using online video conference software","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Trainees making initial contact with patients for telehealth consultations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of physical examination in telehealth consultations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in time in the operating room","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to simulation equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in quality and content of surgical videos","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of well-studied learning methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapidly evolving crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Physical and mental safety of learners","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of contagious diseases due to increased interconnectedness and decentralization of society","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 due to lack of containment measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term economic impact of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of misinformation and disinformation about covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using a permissioned blockchain for providing data sharing from the medical perspective","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing a centralized cloud-based storing service to ensure the availability of medical data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhancing security considerations when sharing sensitive data with the deployment of a discrete wavelet transform and a genetic algorithm technique","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through the use of shared sensing network and iot devices in the hospital environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive patient data due to the interconnected nature of the proposed e-health framework","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible risk of data tampering or corruption in the decentralized storage and exchange of medical information using blockchain technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exchange of medical information over blockchain protocol may lead to privacy and security risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pseudonymous identity information may pose risks to patient privacy and confidentiality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on open-source implementation for pgp encryption may introduce vulnerabilities and security risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Blockchain data leakage and privacy breaches due to unauthorized access or tampering of health information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Smart contract vulnerabilities leading to exploitation and manipulation of health information exchange","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Security risks associated with key management and cryptographic vulnerabilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to confidential medical data due to encryption or decryption errors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability to unauthorized access of the ethereum key pair","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to malicious code or vulnerabilities in open-source javascript libraries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through medical data exchange","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tampering with medical data during exchange","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on blockchain for data control and access","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
